_header: Mine heart is set upon a lusty pin
Subjects: love lyrics; women, as speakers/narrators; women, authors
_description: A love-poem with involved sestina-like stanza-linking ascribed to Queen Elizabeth — six stanzas rhyme royal

BodRawC86.First Lines:
Myne hert is set vppon A lusty pynneI praye to venus of good
                    continuance…
BodRawC86.Last Lines:
…Whiche is ful famous & borne of nobil kynThis ioy and I I
                    trust shal neuer twyn
BodRawC86.Attributed Author:
ffinis quod Quene Elizabeth (last 3 words added after scribe by another
                    sixteenth-century hand, f. 156)
